title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, the perfect addition to your holiday decor!

- **Product Name:** Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set
- **Wreath Diameter:** 23.6 inches
- **Garland Length:** 8.8 feet

**Components:**
- Snowflake pine needle branches
- 2 types of pine cones
- Berry clusters
- Frosted branches
- 100 LED warm lights

**Light Features:**
- Total of 100 LED lights
- Powered by 3 AA batteries
- Timer function: 6 hours on, 18 hours off

**Assembly:** No assembly required

**Material Quality:**
- Made with sturdy high-quality materials
- Hypoallergenic
- Fireproof pins

**Durability:** Strong and durable, designed to last

**Maintenance:** No need for water, never fade

**Suitability:** Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use

**Ideal Locations:** Perfect for decorating walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows

**Warranty:** Enjoy peace of mind with a 365-day warranty

**Customer Service:** Our customer service team is available 24 hours a day to assist you with any questions or concerns.

Make this holiday season extra special with the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and create a festive atmosphere in your home!

Introducing the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, a stunning addition to your holiday decorations. This set includes a wreath with a diameter of 23.6 inches and a garland with a length of 8.8 feet. 

The wreath and garland are made with sturdy high-quality materials, ensuring their durability throughout the holiday season. They are also hypoallergenic and feature fireproof pins for added safety. 

The components of this set include snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. These elements create a beautiful and festive look. 

The set is pre-lit with 100 LED warm lights, which add a cozy and inviting ambiance to your space. The lights are powered by three AA batteries, offering convenience and flexibility in placement. The timer function allows the lights to stay on for 6 hours and then automatically turn off for 18 hours, conserving battery life. 

No assembly is required for this set, making it easy to decorate your home in no time. It is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, allowing you to adorn various locations such as walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. 

The Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set requires minimal maintenance, as it does not need water and will never fade. It is designed to be long-lasting, ensuring that it will bring joy to your holiday season for years to come. 

With a warranty period of 365 days and 24-hour customer service availability, you can purchase this set with confidence. Don't miss out on this must-have holiday decoration. Order the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set today!

We also value your satisfaction as a customer. With a warranty period of 365 days and 24-hour customer service availability, we are committed to providing excellent after-sales support.

Don't miss out on this Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, the perfect way to create a festive atmosphere in your home or office. Order now and make your holiday celebrations truly memorable!
